title: Australian Open 2026: Carlos Alcaraz celebrates 'job done' after 'honour' of completing historic career Grand Slam
desc: Carlos Alcaraz says it is an "honour to put his name in the history books" after becoming the youngest man to win singles titles at all four majors.

title: What Novak Djokovic said to Carlos Alcaraz on court after his historic triumph
desc: Carlos Alcaraz carved his name into the history books by capturing his first Australian Open title on Sunday. The Spaniard defeated Novak Djokovic in the final at Melbourne Park to become the youngest player ever to complete a career Grand Slam.

title: India knocks out Pakistan to seal semi-final berth
desc: The Indian cricket team beat Pakistan in their Super Six match to qualify for the U19 World Cup 2026 semi-finals. Vedant Trivedi scored 68 while Ayush Mhatre got three wickets.

title: PSV 3-0 Feyenoord: First-half blitz sends leaders 17 points clear
desc: Robin van Persie was left stunned as his Feyenoord team were demolished in the first half by Eredivisie leaders PSV on Sunday.

title: Galactic Monsters Grew in Cocoons Like Giant Bugs, Scientists Say
desc: Astronomers say that ancient almost impossibly massive "Little Red Dots" may be black holes trapped in "cocoons."
